replies.author: DayDreaming
replies.txt_content: 这个普通玩家就不要想了。。   要利用代码什么乱七八糟的复杂得很

replies.txt_content: 求怎么做服务器的论坛

replies.author: yezhengmao
replies.txt_content:
.minecraft\bin\minecraft.jar\title\splashes.txt
修改里面的文字就可以了
